source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_SEQ_00<tab>Cassard stands at the entrance to Mord Souq, an eager smile on his face.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_SEQ_00<tab>モルド・スーク前のカサードは、楽しげな様子だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Rhon Ron, and browse the available wares.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_TODO_01<tab>ローンロンと話し、商品を観察

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_000<tab>Mord Souq... Not just full of Mord, but Humes and all manner of others, too! It has long been a refuge for folk displaced by the Flood, so the population is nothing if not diverse.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_000この集落は、「モルド族」の奴らが仕切ってるんだ。
「光の氾濫」以降、行き場を失った人の一部が流入したから、
ヒュム族なんかも住んでるけどな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_001<tab>Oh, have you met a Mord before? They might look like shifty little blighters, but a more welcoming lot you could never wish to meet!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_001お前、モルド族に会うのもはじめてか？
うさんくさいし、体もくさいが、いい奴だぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_002<tab>Speaking of which, we should pay our respects to Master Ghen Gen. I'll go ahead and let him know we've arrived.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_002まずは族長の「ゲーンゲン」さんに挨拶しに行こう。
俺が仲介をしてやるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_005<tab>Go on! Introduce yourself to Master Ghen Gen!
target: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_005<tab>こちらが、族長のゲーンゲンさんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_010<tab>A full Voeburtite honor seems a bit rich for buying a dented pan or a bowl of worms. Did the Exarch lose to you at cards or something!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_010フッブート金貨なんて高価なもの、普通は小遣いで渡さないぜ？
さてはお前……公の弱みでも握ってるのか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_015<tab>Rhon Ron's shop is best for eating! Crack your coinpurse and gorge on the delicious delicacies!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_015ローンロンの店、いい店ヨ！
初買い、いっぱい楽しんでネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_020<tab>Welcome to Rhon Ron's, traveler! I have wares to empty your purse and fill your belly!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_020いらっしゃ～い、旅人さん！
ウチで初買いしていって、ついでに元気もつけてくヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_021<tab>Take your time! Stare and sniff before you choose! But no drooling on the merchandise, yes?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_021ササッ、まずは自慢の商品を、
じっくりまじまじ見てくといいネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_SYTEM_000_022<tab>Browse Rhon Ron's wares. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target a foodstuff and inspect it with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_SYTEM_000_022商品の確認を開始します。
陳列されている商品を、左クリック)) ((ボタン/ボタン)) /var>で確認しましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_040<tab>They all look tasty, yes? Which to choose, which to choose!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_040じっくり、しっかり、吟味できたネ？
それじゃあ、どれを買ってくネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_041<tab>Ah, very wise! You won't wither on the sands with a gut full of cactus fruit filling!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_041よだれパン～！
旅人さん、お目が高いネ！
サボテンの実の効能で、酷暑もへっちゃらヨ！
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_042<tab>それじゃ、お代を頂戴するネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_043<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you forty loaves of bread!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_043フッブート金貨、確かにいただいたネ！
これなら、40個はパンが食べられるヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_044<tab>Yes, put some spice in your step! You won't feel the cold this night...and probably not the next one either!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_044やる気ハム～！
旅人さん、お目が高いネ！
このハムは、旅の元気をつけるにはもってこいヨ！
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_045<tab>それじゃ、お代を頂戴するネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_046<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you ten sides of lizard meat!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_046フッブート金貨、確かにいただいたネ！
これなら、まるまる10ブロックはハムが食べられるヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_047<tab>Mmm, chewy! A quick, easy meal to carry you across the desert!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_047おやつ串～！
旅人さん、お目が高いネ！
出発の前には、これくらい消化しやすいものがいいヨ！
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_048<tab>それじゃ、お代を頂戴するネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_049<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you sixty-five skewers!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_049フッブート金貨、確かにいただいたネ！
これなら、なんと65串も食べられるヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_050<tab>Too good to resist, eh? (That's what I would've chosen!)
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_050ミミズ漬け～！
やっぱりそれを選んじゃうよネ！
ローンロンも大好きヨ～！
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_051<tab>それじゃ、お代を頂戴するネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_052<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you fifteen jars!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_052フッブート金貨、確かにいただいたネ！
これなら、瓶15個分のミミズ漬けが食べられるヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_053<tab>What an appetite! What a belly! A new legend is born in Mord Souq!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_053旅人さん、気持ちのいい食べっぷりだったネ！
ローンロンもみんなも、感動しちゃったヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_054<tab>Our visitor invites us to feast! Let us give thanks for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> great generosity─and small appetite!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_054やった～！
みんな、旅人さんに感謝するネ！
それから、ここまでの健闘に拍手～！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_055<tab>Consider your coinpurse cracked! I am pleased to accept your custom, and Ghen Gen will be pleased that you honored ours!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_055初買いも、これで成立ネ！
スークの仲間が増えて、ローンロンも嬉しいヨ！
「ゲーンゲン」さんにも、伝えておくといいネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_056<tab>...Keeping the merchandise down, yes? No returns!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_060<tab>I am honored to have been chosen! Go to Ghen Gen! Let him know that your coinpurse has been most decidedly cracked.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_060ウチで初買いしてくれて、ローンロン嬉しいヨ！
「ゲーンゲン」さんにも、伝えておくといいネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_065<tab>I've never seen anyone eat so much of Rhon Ron's “cuisine” in one sitting... You've a stronger stomach than I!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_065ここから見てたが、よくがんばって食べたな……。
ナイスファイトだったぜ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_070<tab>I was watching from here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You honored our custom, and with great relish!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_070ここから見てたヨ、)) (( )) 02 /var>の初買い！
気持ちのいい買いっぷりをしてくれて、ありがとネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_071<tab>You will always be welcome in Mord Souq─if you need anything in Amh Araeng, we are here to provide!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_071これで、)) (( )) 02 /var>もスークの仲間、
次に来たときには「常連」ネ！
アム・アレーンで困ったことあったら、頼ってヨ！
